title: Michael Myers

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Each night, stalk a player.
- At night, kill a player you’ve stalked

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players who you’ve stalked will be informed that they feel like someone is watching them. If you are attacked the night after stalking a player, that player becomes Unstalked
- Your attacks against stalked players bypass effects that would heal or otherwise prevent your attack.
- Roleblock immune
- Control immune
- If your target is transported with another player, you still attack your original target
- If you stalk a player 2 nights in a row, your attack becomes piercing against them, making your attack level one above their defense level.

desc:
Post 5276
_“I met him, 15 years ago; I was told there was nothing left; no reason, no conscience, no understanding in even the most rudimentary sense of life or death, of good or evil, right or wrong. I met this... six-year-old child with this blank, pale, emotionless face, and... the blackest eyes - the Devil's eyes. I spent eight years trying to reach him, and then another seven trying to keep him locked up, because I realized that what was living behind that boy's eyes was purely and simply... evil.” -Loomis_
